spotlight.name: Amy Carney
spotlight.biography: Hi! My name is Amy and my craft is web design. The bulk of my background lies in psychology and libraries. I care about how people think, how they interact with others and technology, and how information is accessed by everyone.

spotlight.name: Want to nominate someone?
spotlight.biography: Know of someone doing amazing accessibility work? Tell us about them!
